about_the_game:
Welcome to Kanji Kitchen! A unique fusion of cooking and language learning. From mochi-making to mastering Hiragana, Katakana, 2000+ Kanji, and the most essential words, your kitchen is your classroom.


Mnemonics

Kanji Kitchen takes an optimized approach to language learning by decomposing kanji into simple components. By crafting engaging stories around each kanji, you'll experience enhanced memory retention and acquisition. For Katakana and Hiragana, visual mnemonics are deployed, transforming characters into vivid imagery.




Personalized Learning

Utilizing an intelligent Spaced Repetition System (SRS), Kanji Kitchen adapts to you, showing you the right characters at the ideal time. But it doesn't stop there! The system also automatically introduces new words, integrating them seamlessly based on the Kanji, Hiragana, and Katakana you know best. It's a dynamic, intelligent learning experience, tailored to your progress and understanding, ensuring that your linguistic journey evolves with you.

Rewards and Progression

Turn learning into a rewarding adventure. Correct translations earn you coins and gems for customization, adding flair and personality to your culinary journey. Whether it's unlocking stylish chef skins, vibrant keyboard aesthetics, or progressing to new levels, every success is rewarded, making the learning experience not just educational but truly gratifying.

A Fun and Streamlined Experience

With Kanji Kitchen, learning is seamless and enjoyable. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Kanji Kitchen lets you customize your educational journey. Already fluent in Hiragana? Simply disable it at the press of a button. This seamless integration of learning and gameplay creates a fresh approach to language mastery.


Get your chef's hat on and embrace the flavours of the Japanese language! Kanji Kitchen is serving up a one-of-a-kind education, where learning meets fun, and the kitchen is always open!

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel or AMD GPU
